wikipedia_page.main: Joe Mennonna is a British accomplished session musician, who worked with Ian Gillan and Roger Glover on their 1988 album Accidentally on Purpose, and toured with Ian Gillan in September 2006 in support of the Gillan's Inn album.  He also appears on Gillan's Live in Anaheim.Mennonna toured with The Bacon Brothers Band playing a Hammond B3 with a 122 Leslie, a Roland Rd-700GX, and a tenor saxophone.
